metadata.Title: CVE-2020-11866 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description:
libEMF (aka ECMA-234 Metafile Library) through 1.0.11 allows a use-after-free.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-11866` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libemf1 - 1.0.12-1
printemf - 1.0.12-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libemf package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.12-1').
